hotel_name: Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi
review_body: Nothing disappointing about this hotel. Staff and service were friendly and helpful. The hotel's location is very convenient, near the Tokyo station and a 10-15 minute walking distance to Ginza. Very spacious rooms for Tokyo standards. Look forward to returning!

hotel_name: Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi
review_body: This Four Seasons is definitely a 5+ star rating experience. It's conveniently located in a safe and central area of Tokyo. The train station is located foot steps away with access to plenty of restaurants and shops. I look forward to returning to this location next year. Don't miss the opportunity to feel pampered, greeted and supported while staying with an incredibly professional and detailed oriented staff.

hotel_name: Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi
review_body: Hats off to the Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi for an amazing stay with incredibly genuine and caring service. From the moment we were met at the station by two wonderful staff members to help with our big ski bags we knew we were in for a treat!The hotel is lovely - luxurious rooms, beautifully appointed with wood, leather and gold leaf accents. Spacious and stylish bathrooms with every amenity.The main restaurant on level 7 is spectacular. Great city views and watching the bullet trains pull in and out of Tokyo station is great! Food is beautifully prepared and a great variety of both western and Japanese dishes - perfect for our Family.But what makes this hotel more special than others is the service of the staff. The genuine and caring service of the staff is absolutely beyond what weâ€™ve experienced at any other Five star hotel. Always making sure we have everything we need; giving great tips for restaurants and things to visit....and probably most importantly helping me when I was ill. The staff walked me to the doctor surgery; spoke with the surgery staff in Japanese so they knew what I needed and even showed me were the pharmacy was located. The service was above and beyond and made a real difference when I was feeling unwell. Thank you Four Seasons Tokyo. We will return.
